channel.title: GloryTscape is back!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I'm here to tell you about a new server that was just re-opened. We use to be a fairly popular server with a ton of donations, and around 5-20 players on at all times. We're back again! The server name is GloryTscape. Owned by Dave. The site name will be posted below, along with a few Screen Shots of the server.
Features!!! - Forums: www.glorytscape.0fees.net - Bascially no lag. - Amazing donor benefits - 317 Loading 562. - NEED STAFF AND ACTIVE PLAYERS. TALK TO DAVE OR DAVEYY FOR INFO ON STAFF - Webclient and Download client available. - Friendly Eco, player based. - Money is fairly easy to attain - Active community and staff. - 24 working skills including Dung, and Summoning. - Yanille Home, and SOL Spec. - 100% Up Time - Instant Switching for pking - Eco and pk based server. - Donor tab instant slayer task - Rock Tail Fishing for donors only - Custom donor zone - You mine your essence for RC, theres no shop for them. - Sky colors change depending on the time. For example, they could be blue, red. - One quest as of right now! - Working fishing guild! - Pk house, with fun pk, and normal pk. - 99% of the doors are working, meaning you can open them. - 8 floors of working dung, with a vary of good rewards. - Barrows on top of the hills, makes it easier for people who only want a certain type of armour. - Player owned Shops - Active Forums - Monsters in the wildy that drop pk armour. - Too many more features to list, if you want to see them all come in-game.
Screen Shots!!! http://prntscr.com/ibxho Home http://prntscr.com/ibxjs Rune Essence http://prntscr.com/ibxn2 Barrows http://prntscr.com/ibxr2 Pest Control Shop http://prntscr.com/ibxsi Bosses http://prntscr.com/ibxxo Various Pk zones. http://prntscr.com/iby29 Vesta Armour http://prntscr.com/iby56 Stat Armour http://prntscr.com/iby7f Morg Armour http://prntscr.com/iby8x Zuriel Armour http://prntscr.com/ibys0 Skill Zone http://prntscr.com/ibyxe Agility http://prntscr.com/ibyz5 hunter http://prntscr.com/ibz5z Fishing Guild http://prntscr.com/ibzgn Theiving http://prntscr.com/ibzi6 Advanced Bosses http://prntscr.com/ibzlp Dung Lobby http://prntscr.com/ibznj Dung Shop 1 http://prntscr.com/ibzp8 Dung Shop 2 http://prntscr.com/ibzqh Dung shop 3. http://prntscr.com/ibzsg Custom Interface Tab.

item.title: GloryTscape is back!
item.dc:creator: @blackshadow1 blackshadow1
item.description:
@blackshadow1 wrote:

Hello everyone, I’m here to tell you about a new server that was just re-opened. We use to be a fairly popular server with a ton of donations, and around 5-20 players on at all times. We’re back again! The server name is GloryTscape. Owned by Dave. The site name will be posted below, along with a few Screen Shots of the server.

                                    Features!!!

  • Forums: www.glorytscape.0fees.net

  • Bascially no lag.

  • Amazing donor benefits

  • 317 Loading 562.

  • NEED STAFF AND ACTIVE PLAYERS. TALK TO DAVE OR DAVEYY FOR INFO ON STAFF

  • Webclient and Download client available.

  • Friendly Eco, player based.

  • Money is fairly easy to attain

  • Active community and staff.

  • 24 working skills including Dung, and Summoning.

  • Yanille Home, and SOL Spec.

  • 100% Up Time

  • Instant Switching for pking

  • Eco and pk based server.

  • Donor tab instant slayer task

  • Rock Tail Fishing for donors only

  • Custom donor zone

  • You mine your essence for RC, theres no shop for them.

  • Sky colors change depending on the time. For example, they could be blue, red.

  • One quest as of right now!

  • Working fishing guild!

  • Pk house, with fun pk, and normal pk.

  • 99% of the doors are working, meaning you can open them.

  • 8 floors of working dung, with a vary of good rewards.

  • Barrows on top of the hills, makes it easier for people who only want a certain type of armour.

  • Player owned Shops

  • Active Forums

  • Monsters in the wildy that drop pk armour.

  • Too many more features to list, if you want to see them all come in-game.

                                       Screen Shots!!!
